name: Chick Flick
description:
Controls

  • Jump - Flick up on screen / Space bar
  • Toss fly - Onscreen button on the right / ctrl key

Some egregious animal has stolen the unhatched siblings and scarpered leaving them stranded in the wilderness.

Flick the only hatched chick over gaps along the path and other predators to retrieve the eggs.

Eat flies along the way for more health but you may have to toss these flies at predators that are harder to dodge.
